# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(AmberMD LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
add_executable(AmberMD "")
set_target_properties(AmberMD PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "AmberMD")
set_target_properties(AmberMD PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/linux/x86_64/release")
target_include_directories(AmberMD PRIVATE
    include
)
target_compile_options(AmberMD PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
)
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET AmberMD PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_options(AmberMD PRIVATE
    -m64
)
target_sources(AmberMD PRIVATE
    src/SystemInfo.cpp
    src/common.cpp
    src/base.cpp
    main.cpp
)
